description: [GNU/consensus](https://gnu.org/consensus) is a GNU project to coordinate development efforts of free software for social networking. It recommends using the [AGPLv3+ license](https://gnu.org/licenses/agpl) and aims to inform free software developers about interesting projects and perspectives for a decentralized, freedom-respecting, and privacy-respecting online social networking environment. The GNU/consensus promotes convergence towards the use of the extensible [GNUnet Social API](https://gnunet.org/design-social-messaging-system).
name: GNU/consensus
